benefits.title: Discover the benefits of using Demy
benefits.subtitle: Benefits
benefits.description: Everything you need to know about why using Demy is better than using paper or programs like Excel.
benefits.description1: Reduce manual work, save time, and minimize human errors that commonly occur with spreadsheets or manual tasks.
benefits.description2: Unlike an Excel file that can be outdated or saved locally, Demy allows online collaboration and a global view of your operations.
benefits.description3: Excel becomes unmanageable with large amounts of data, while a well-designed app adapts to your institutionâ€™s growth.
